segments.text: Well , we try ! Here , I just made some carrot juice . Would you like a glass ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why not ! Before you know it , I'll be heading off to the mountains to stand on my head !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You don't have to go to the mountains ! I stand on my head during my yoga routine every morning !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thanks for the carrot juice , Mrs . Schmidt . I've got to run to class !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Have a good day at school ! See you tonight !
segments.speaker: S2
